languages.text: "Готовить следующее поколение слуг династии, учить их, отделять способных от тех, кто достиг потолка — мой долг как Сенешаля. На этом корабле полно пилотов, блюстителей, офицеров, техников и распорядителей, которых я взрастил. Проклятье, да каждый третий на этом мостике — из моих учеников".

"To prepare new generations of the dynasty's servants, to instruct them, and to separate those with potential from those who have exhausted it — that is my duty as Seneschal. This ship has bays worth of pilots, enforcers, officers, technicians, and stewards whom I have raised personally. By the Throne, every third person standing on this bridge right now was my student at one point."
languages.original_text: "Готовить следующее поколение слуг династии, учить их, отделять способных от тех, кто достиг потолка — мой долг как Сенешаля. На этом корабле полно пилотов, блюстителей, офицеров, техников и распорядителей, которых я взрастил. Проклятье, да каждый третий на этом мостике — из моих учеников".

This ship has bays worth of pilots, enforcers, officers, technicians, and stewards I have raised. By the Throne, every third person standing on this bridge right now was my student at one point."

languages.text: "Die Ausbildung neuer Generationen von Dienern der Dynastie und die Förderung von Einheiten mit Potenzial ... das ist meine Pflicht als Truchsess. Auf diesem Schiff gibt es zahllose Piloten, Enforcer, Techniker und Aufseher, die ich persönlich gefördert habe. Beim Thron, jeder Dritte auf dieser Brücke war irgendwann einmal mein Schüler."
languages.original_text: "To prepare new generations of the dynasty's servants, to instruct them, and to separate those with potential from those who have exhausted it — that is my duty as Seneschal. This ship has bays worth of pilots, enforcers, officers, technicians, and stewards whom I have raised personally. By the Throne, every third person standing on this bridge right now was my student at one point."

traits.locale_text: "Die Ausbildung neuer Generationen von Dienern der Dynastie und die Förderung von Einheiten mit Potenzial ... das ist meine Pflicht als Truchsess. Auf diesem Schiff gibt es zahllose Piloten, Enforcer, Techniker und Aufseher, die ich persönlich gefördert habe. Beim Thron, jeder Dritte auf dieser Brücke war irgendwann einmal mein Schüler."

languages.text: « Préparer de nouvelles générations de serviteurs pour la dynastie, les instruire et séparer ceux qui ont du potentiel de ceux qui ont atteint leurs limites, tel est mon devoir en tant que sénéchal. Ce vaisseau compte à son bord des régiments entiers de pilotes, de prévôts, d'officiers, de techniciens et d'intendants que j'ai formés personnellement. Par le Trône, un bon tiers des individus qui se trouvent actuellement sur cette passerelle ont été mes élèves à un moment ou à un autre. »
languages.original_text: "To prepare new generations of the dynasty's servants, to instruct them, and to separate those with potential from those who have exhausted it — that is my duty as Seneschal. This ship has bays worth of pilots, enforcers, officers, technicians, and stewards whom I have raised personally. By the Throne, every third person standing on this bridge right now was my student at one point."

traits.locale_text: « Préparer de nouvelles générations de serviteurs pour la dynastie, les instruire et séparer ceux qui ont du potentiel de ceux qui ont atteint leurs limites, tel est mon devoir en tant que sénéchal. Ce vaisseau compte à son bord des régiments entiers de pilotes, de prévôts, d'officiers, de techniciens et d'intendants que j'ai formés personnellement. Par le Trône, un bon tiers des individus qui se trouvent actuellement sur cette passerelle ont été mes élèves à un moment ou à un autre. »

languages.text: «Preparar a las nuevas generaciones de siervos de la dinastía, instruirlas y separar a quienes muestren potencial de aquellos que hayan agotado el suyo por completo; ese es mi deber como senescal. Esta nave tiene compartimentos enteros llenos de pilotos, guardias, oficiales, técnicos y funcionarios a los que he criado personalmente. Por el Trono, una de cada tres personas de las aquí presentes ha sido alumna mía en algún momento».
languages.original_text: "To prepare new generations of the dynasty's servants, to instruct them, and to separate those with potential from those who have exhausted it — that is my duty as Seneschal. This ship has bays worth of pilots, enforcers, officers, technicians, and stewards whom I have raised personally. By the Throne, every third person standing on this bridge right now was my student at one point."

traits.locale_text: «Preparar a las nuevas generaciones de siervos de la dinastía, instruirlas y separar a quienes muestren potencial de aquellos que hayan agotado el suyo por completo; ese es mi deber como senescal. Esta nave tiene compartimentos enteros llenos de pilotos, guardias, oficiales, técnicos y funcionarios a los que he criado personalmente. Por el Trono, una de cada tres personas de las aquí presentes ha sido alumna mía en algún momento».

languages.text: 「王朝に仕える新たな世代に準備をさせ、彼らを指導し、可能性を持つものとそれを使い果たしたものを区別する。それが家令長としての勤めです。この船のベイには、自らの手で育てたパイロット、エンフォーサー、士官、技術者、執事がいます。王座にかけて、今この時、ブリッジに立っている三人に一人が私のかつての教え子です」
languages.original_text: "To prepare new generations of the dynasty's servants, to instruct them, and to separate those with potential from those who have exhausted it — that is my duty as Seneschal. This ship has bays worth of pilots, enforcers, officers, technicians, and stewards whom I have raised personally. By the Throne, every third person standing on this bridge right now was my student at one point."

traits.locale_text: 「王朝に仕える新たな世代に準備をさせ、彼らを指導し、可能性を持つものとそれを使い果たしたものを区別する。それが家令長としての勤めです。この船のベイには、自らの手で育てたパイロット、エンフォーサー、士官、技術者、執事がいます。王座にかけて、今この時、ブリッジに立っている三人に一人が私のかつての教え子です」

languages.text: “这是我身为总领的职责。我需要为王朝培养新一代的仆人，指导他们，从庸人之中找出那些有潜力的人。这艘船上有许多飞行员、执法者、军官、技工、主管，都是我亲自培养出来的。黄金王座在上，舰桥里的这些人，至少有三分之一都曾是我的学生。”
languages.original_text: "To prepare new generations of the dynasty's servants, to instruct them, and to separate those with potential from those who have exhausted it — that is my duty as Seneschal. This ship has bays worth of pilots, enforcers, officers, technicians, and stewards whom I have raised personally. By the Throne, every third person standing on this bridge right now was my student at one point."

traits.locale_text: “这是我身为总领的职责。我需要为王朝培养新一代的仆人，指导他们，从庸人之中找出那些有潜力的人。这艘船上有许多飞行员、执法者、军官、技工、主管，都是我亲自培养出来的。黄金王座在上，舰桥里的这些人，至少有三分之一都曾是我的学生。”

languages.text: "Hanedanlığın yeni nesil hizmetkârlarını hazırlamak, eğitmek ve potansiyeli olanlarla potansiyelini tüketenleri ayırmak, Seneşal olarak vazifemdir. Bu gemide bizzat yetiştirdiğim güverteler dolusu pilot, infazcı, subay, teknisyen ve idareci var. Taht aşkına, bu gemide şu an mevcut olan üç kişiden biri bir noktada öğrencimdi."
languages.original_text: "To prepare new generations of the dynasty's servants, to instruct them, and to separate those with potential from those who have exhausted it — that is my duty as Seneschal. This ship has bays worth of pilots, enforcers, officers, technicians, and stewards whom I have raised personally. By the Throne, every third person standing on this bridge right now was my student at one point."
